title: Hamish and Andy's new trailer for Perfect Holiday
text:
Their very first Gap Year saw them take in the sights and sounds of the United States back in 2011.

And Hamish Blake and Andy Lee have decided to venture stateside once again for their new TV show, Hamish & Andy's 'Perfect' Holiday.

The trailer for the forthcoming series dropped this week and poses the question: How will two best friends possibly agree on what to see and do?

According to the teaser's narrator: 'Easy... they won't!'

Andy, 38, has trusted Hamish, 37, to plan his daily activities - and Hamish has trusted his longtime best mate to do the same.

Every day, they'll take it in turns to reveal what adventure is planned for the other and t ogether, they'll meet everyday Americans with some pretty extraordinary pastimes.





Prepare for take-off! Hamish Blake and Andy Lee have released the trailer for their new Channel Nine travel show, Hamish & Andy's 'Perfect' Holiday

Frequent flyers: Andy, 38, has trusted Hamish, 37, to plan his daily activities - and Hamish has trusted his longtime best mate to do the same

Here comes trouble! The trailer for the forthcoming series dropped this week and poses the question: How will two best friends possibly agree on what to see and do?

Hamish recently summed up 'Perfect' Holiday on The Kyle and Jackie O Show, saying: 'It'll still be us making each other eat weird things, pushing each other into swamps and stuff...'

'We know the route we're travelling but every alternating day I'll plan a day for Andy and then the next day he plans the day,' he added.

It comes after Hamish responded to rumours that his sidekick had been approached to co-host Channel Nine's struggling Today show.

The Lego Masters presenter said he'd be 'surprised' if Andy took the job as he prefers to sleep in on weekdays.

'Having known Andy for 20 years I'm pretty familiar with our policy on early mornings. I'd be surprised if that changed,' Hamish told TV Tonight.

Hamish & Andy's 'Perfect' Holiday will premiere in November on Channel Nine
